meanings: one may well say so, but...

vlive.korean: 하여튼 그렇다고요 '아 그 느낌' 아시죠 그 느낌? Anyway, that's that. "Oh, that feeling." You know, right? 듣기 View video ITZY : 🖤

examples.korean: She murmured her agreement. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 속삭이듯 그러겠다고[그렇다고] 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: After a moment’s indecision, he said yes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 잠깐 망설이다가 그러겠다고[그렇다고] 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: We’ll have to be careful with money but that doesn’t mean (that) we can’t enjoy ourselves. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리가 돈에 신중해야 하겠지만 그렇다고 우리가 즐기지도 못한다는 뜻은 아니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
